trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event occurs when the user clicks a panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>當使用者按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>面板，就會發生事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs specifies which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked, the mouse button that was pressed, how many times it was pressed, and the coordinates of the mouse click at the time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> was clicked.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs 指定哪一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>已按下，已按下滑鼠按鈕、 多少次它被按下，和當時滑鼠點選座標<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event to perform tasks related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別中的事件處理常式所提供的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>事件來執行工作與相關的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>在按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is used to display the time, you could create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event and use data provided by this class to display a dialog box that allows you to modify the date and time on the system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>是用來顯示時間，您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>事件並使用這個類別，以顯示對話方塊，可讓您修改的日期和時間在系統上的所提供的資料。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel that was clicked.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values that represents the mouse buttons that were clicked while over the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref>值，表示已按下滑鼠按鈕時透過<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of times that the mouse button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 已按下滑鼠按鈕的次數。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 按一下滑鼠的 x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 按一下滑鼠的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 StatusBarPanel 屬性可讓您取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform tasks such as displaying custom dialog boxes when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件處理常式內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項來執行工作，例如顯示自訂對話方塊方塊時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>
